title: Using MarkLogic 5 to Reveal the Images in OSA's Optics and Photonics Journal Content
abstract:
Following a strategic plan to make its content more interoperable, accessible, and discoverable, The Optical Society (OSA) has decided to manage its journal content in MarkLogic for more flexible display of its content and for the development of new products and services. 
 
The first such product is an Image Bank that allows users to search and browse figure images across OSAâ€™s journal portfolio. The Image Bank allows users to retrieve images by searching caption text or applying filters for chronology, topical area, and other derived search facets within the content. 
    
In concert with Yuxi Pacific, OSA intends to develop the product to eventually include more than 1 million images, taking advantage of several innovative features within MarkLogic 5, including build-ins for managing binary content and advanced search faceting and indexing.
